name: Fetch_and_Process_Post
description: A workflow to fetch data from a JSON placeholder and process it.

transitions.name: fetch_data
transitions.end_state_description: Data has been successfully fetched from the API

transitions.name: process_data
transitions.start_state_description: Data has been successfully fetched from the API

externalized_processors.name: process_process_data
externalized_processors.description: Handles the logic for processing the fetched data
